mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_oauth_tokens WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_oauth_tokens (user_id, access_token, token_type, expires_at, refresh_token, refresh_token_expires_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{accessToken, typeHandler=com.ssafy.dash.common.encrypt.CryptoTypeHandler}, #{tokenType}, #{expiresAt}, #{refreshToken, typeHandler=com.ssafy.dash.common.encrypt.CryptoTypeHandler}, #{refreshTokenExpiresAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_oauth_tokens SET access_token = #{accessToken, typeHandler=com.ssafy.dash.common.encrypt.CryptoTypeHandler}, token_type = #{tokenType}, expires_at = #{expiresAt}, refresh_token = #{refreshToken, typeHandler=com.ssafy.dash.common.encrypt.CryptoTypeHandler}, refresh_token_expires_at = #{refreshTokenExpiresAt} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
